title: Engineering Intern
summary: Developed an AI-powered log analysis tool using Vertex AI to reduce troubleshooting time and improve issue accuracy. Optimized log processing, reducing data volume by 70%, and designed secure log masking. Created a security tool using Shell and PowerShell scripts to identify over 100 exposed credentials across multiple machines.
jobDescription: Designed an AI-powered log analysis tool using Vertex AI for identifying root causes of job failures. The system processes 300+ daily requests, reducing troubleshooting time and improving accuracy in issue identification.
Optimized log processing by implementing smart parsing and filtering, reducing data volume by 70%, and designed secure log masking to protect sensitive information.

Created a security tool using Shell and PowerShell scripts to query databases for passwords and scan logs across multiple machines, identifying over 100 instances of exposed credentials and encrypted password loggings.

title: Software Development Engineer In Test
summary: Specialized in building and optimizing automation frameworks using Java and Python to enhance software quality and system reliability. Automated critical testing processes, including auto-scaling verifications for Azure and AWS. Developed a full-stack test management application to improve scheduling and reporting efficiency. Implemented Infrastructure as Code (IaC) to streamline cloud resource management, reducing manual efforts by 60%. Contributed as a Subject Matter Expert, resolving complex issues and improving team productivity.
jobDescription: Developed Java automation frameworks and performed manual testing to enhance the quality and reliability of the Virtual Server Agent (VSA) for virtualization backups and recovery.
Automated the verification of auto-scaling for Azure and AWS (EC2), conducting performance and load testing to ensure accurate scaling, optimized resource usage, and effective idle agent cleanup.
Developed AutoCenter, a Java web application managing 2000+ test cases using Spring Boot (backend) and React (frontend) to improve test scheduling, reporting, and monitoring capabilities.
Implemented Infrastructure as Code (IaC) using Terraform and Ansible to automate VM and cloud resource management on Azure and AWS, reducing manual intervention by 60% and improving cost efficiency.
Resolved 30+ critical issues as a Subject Matter Expert (SME) for Microsoft Hyper-V and Azure solutions, enhancing system reliability and customer satisfaction.
Mentored interns in test automation, planning, and best practices, boosting team productivity.

title: Associate Software Engineer
summary: Designed and implemented a hybrid testing framework that combined Selenium UI tests with SDK-based validations, significantly reducing redundancy in test cases and improving overall test coverage. This framework minimized code duplication, facilitating easier maintenance and leading to a more scalable and efficient automation pipeline.
jobDescription: Designed a hybrid testing framework combining Selenium UI tests with SDK-based validations, improving coverage and reducing code duplication across 600+ automated test cases.

Optimized Azure cloud resource utilization, achieving a 60% cost reduction by developing Java-based automation scripts and leveraging PowerShell for resource monitoring, alerting, and report consolidation.
Built and maintained a REST API test automation framework using RestAssured and TestNG, seamlessly integrated into CI/CD pipelines to ensure robust backend testing and smooth deployments.
